name: Joomla Shortcode Plugin
tagline: Mimicks Portfolio sans all the hassle
body:
### Use
VIEW only `{bild url=target/link/for/view}{img=path/to/img}{tt=Title}`  
VIEW&ZOOM `{beide url=target/link/for/view}{img=path/to/img}{tt=Title}`  
ZOOM only `{zoom url=target/link/for/view}{img=path/to/img}{tt=Title}`
